channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Masterpieces Of Historic Capitals
channel.desc: Historic capitals in the Kansai region are home to a wealth of national treasures and masterpieces. In Nara, we delve into astonishing Buddhist and Shinto art.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Treasure Box Japan
channel.desc: A selection of acclaimed programs from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: A depression treatment called rTMS is showing promise. It uses magnetic fields to stimulate the brain and may also help to prevent a relapse when combined with antidepressants.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
channel.desc: In this episode, we learn about rikka and shoman, two dates of early summer. The temple chefs teach us how to make kimpira stir fry with itadori and mehari-zushi (eye-popping sushi).

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: On this episode, we meet Vietnamese Nguyen Quoc Dam who works as a nurse in Kashiwa, Chiba Prefecture, as well as Australian William Rhodes, a garbage collector in Musashino, Tokyo.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: The Kawanishi Dainenbutsu Kenbai dance tells the story of restless souls being guided to the Pure Land by the Buddha, in the form of a monkey. In 2022, it became UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Magical Japanese
channel.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to tea. Explore the unique culture behind them.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: Bara Kyoushitsu in Kani City, Gifu Prefecture, is a preschool designed to eliminate the number of foreign children who stop attending school because they don't understand Japanese.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hometown Stories
channel.desc: Stories about people, stories about life. Intimate portraits of people from around Japan, each leading diverse lives while enriching lives of others.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: 1/10: Married By Matching Apps
channel.desc: 1 in 10 Japanese got married through online spouse-hunting services in 2020. We interview women who use matchmaking apps, including Manami, who uses multiple apps to find a perfect partner.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: In the ancient capital, Nara, Peter MacMillan finds traditional sites and sacred animals. On this program, get to know the real Japan and discover useful travel tips.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Journey
channel.desc: The world comes alive in a different way after sunset, with bright city lights or the glow of a 24-hour industrial complex. See how the scenery changes through the night with time-lapse photography.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Beware! False Info And Impression
channel.desc: After a major earthquake hits, the father posts a video online spreading a rumor that the quake was "man-made." Of course, this earns a scolding from his daughter, but like always, not much changes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Document 72 Hours
channel.desc: A 24-hour laundromat in Osaka is a vital part of daily life for residents from all walks of life. For three days, we asked customers why they wash and dry their clothes there.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo Mini
channel.desc: Bananas in Japan visit a plantation in one of the country's snowiest regions, and learn how sweetness is carefully developed in large Tokyo warehouses during the import process.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Masterpieces Of Tsutaju
channel.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode takes a close look at artist Utamaro's iconic "Woman with a Glass Noisemaker.

channel.title: 1/10: Married By Matching Apps
channel.desc: 1 in 10 Japanese got married through online spouse-hunting services in 2020. We interview women who use matchmaking apps, including Manami, who uses multiple apps to find a perfect partner.

channel.title: Deeper Look
channel.desc: An experienced anchor Del Irani has a cutting-edge dialogue with a first-class guest on a current-affairs topics.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
channel.desc: Learn about easy, delicious and healthy cooking with Chef Rika! Featured recipe: Udon Noodles with Vegetables and Wasabi.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: My Street Piano
channel.desc: Shibuya is one of Tokyo's largest cities. A piano is placed near a ticket gate at the station, and people stop to play from their heart.

channel.desc: Traditional techniques and resourceful recipes! Chefs Saito and Rika, present their unique approaches to cooking delicious Japanese food.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cinematic Journey
channel.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: The Masterpieces Of Tsutaju
channel.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode features ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's "The Actor Ichikawa Ebizo as Takemura Sadanoshin.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: Kagura is a form of votive music and dance that started over a thousand years ago. Akitakata in Hiroshima Prefecture has a hall dedicated to year-round kagura performances, and 22 kagura troupes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Journey
channel.desc: Experience the fascinating sights of the airports and transport hubs which connect Japan with the world. Time-lapse photography will show you how these places bustle with activity around the clock.

channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Amami: Shimauta
channel.desc: Shimauta is the soul music of Amami Oshima. Islanders have long used it to convey feelings in good times and bad. The history of the music and of the island itself is conveyed in time-lapse footage.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Amami: Tanaka Isson
channel.desc: Tanaka Isson had a unique gift for portraying Amami Oshima's nature in art. A child prodigy, his career faltered until he moved to the island. Time-lapse footage hints at scenes that inspired him.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: Kagura is a form of votive music and dance that started over a thousand years ago. Akitakata in Hiroshima Prefecture has a hall dedicated to year-round kagura performances, and 22 kagura troupes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan In Focus
channel.desc: Many elderly Japanese have difficulty chewing or swallowing, and must follow soft, nutritional "dysphagia diets." Kawabata Eri is teaching caregivers how to make appetizing dysphagia-friendly dishes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nun's Cookbook
channel.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple teach us how to make shinoda rolls with taro stalks, a simple fall dish suitable for festive occasions.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Masterpieces Of Tsutaju

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nun's Cookbook
channel.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple show us how to make sesame-covered taro dumplings. Simply mash up boiled taro, add cheese, sprinkle with sesame, and deep fry for some tasty autumn goodness.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: Massage chairs.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Oda Yuriko suffers from a progressive disease, but by running a patient association, developing an app, and other activities, she's working toward a society in which anybody can enjoy life.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: In 2021, a massive submarine volcano erupted off Japan. We follow Japanese researchers' efforts to understand the eruption, and witness their discovery of obsidian and even new sea creatures.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Kabuki Kool
channel.desc: Every hero needs a good villain, and kabuki has everything from ambitious schemers to vile seducers, and even the odd comic villain. Actor Kataoka Ainosuke explores the roles' appeal.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dive In Tokyo
channel.desc: Ochanomizu is a college town with roots going back 200 years to an academy started by the Edo Shogunate. Come along and see why the area is known for used books, musical instruments, and curry.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Direct Talk is an in-depth interview program featuring professionals or experts in the world who share their unique insights, information and analysis.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsline Asia 24
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: Taimatsu Akashi honors those who died defending the castle in Sukagawa in 1589. Local people form teams to make huge torches that are set alight in a hilltop park to commemorate the fallen warriors.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
channel.desc: In squid-loving Japan, spear squid is immensely popular. Tag along with fishers in Hokkaido and savor some regional cuisine, fresh sushi, and a special take on a beloved Italian-inspired inky dish.
